mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Busher, Edward
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Busher, Edward Patient Age: 17. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Dislocation of right shoulder joint. Head of humunus thrown inwards and upwards resting under the pectoralis major muscle and in con stuck with the pectoralis minor and coracoid process of the scapula. Treatment: 1864/09/13 Reduction by extrusion and conterextrusion by laying the patient on the floor upon his back and by placing the head in the axilla and laying hold of the forearm by cconsiderable and continued force the laxation was released. Dressing a wedge shaped pad in axilla the arm bound to the body by several turns of bandage. By Townsend and West. . Result: Returned to duty.
